languages.text: {n}Конюшня — место черни, а не господ. Но вашему телу отчего-то знакомы запахи бедности. Сознание расправляется тяжело, как больные легкие. Вы помните большую корзину, зажатые в ваших руках узелки с едой и благодарные улыбки голодных.{/n}

traits.locale_text: Всплывает лицо скульптора, перекошенное от злости и т.д

languages.text: {n}A stable is a place for peasants, not sovereigns. But, somehow, your body remembers the scents of poverty. Your consciousness expands heavily, like sick lungs. You remember a large basket, bundles of food clutched in your hands, and the grateful smiles of the hungry.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Конюшня — место черни, а не господ. Но вашему телу отчего-то знакомы запахи бедности. Сознание расправляется тяжело, как больные легкие. Вы помните большую корзину, зажатые в ваших руках узелки с едой и благодарные улыбки голодных.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A stable is a place for peasants, not sovereigns. But, somehow, your body remembers the scents of poverty. Your consciousness expands heavily, like sick lungs. You remember a large basket, bundles of food clutched in your hands, and the grateful smiles of the hungry.{/n}

{n}A stable is a place for the peasantry, not sovereigns. But somehow, your body remembers its smell. Your consciousness expands heavily, like sick lungs. Are those your memories? Or are they the scraps of someone else's past?{/n}

{n}A stable is a place for peasants, not sovereigns. But, somehow, your body remembers the scents of poverty. Your consciousness expands heavily, like sick lungs. You remember a large basket, bundles of food clutched in your hands, and the grateful smiles of the hungry.{/n}

{n}A stable is a place for peasants, not sovereigns. But, somehow, your body remembers the scents of poverty. Your consciousness expands heavily, like sick lungs. You remember a large basket, bundles of food clutched in your hands, and the grateful smiles of the hungry.{/n}

languages.text: {n}马厩是农奴干活的地方，不是领主该待的地方，但不知为何，你的身体却牢牢地铭记着贫穷的味道。你的意识沉重、膨胀，仿佛水肿的肺叶一般。你记得那个大篮子，记得手里捧过的一捆捆食物，还有那些挨饿的人感激的笑容。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A stable is a place for peasants, not sovereigns. But, somehow, your body remembers the scents of poverty. Your consciousness expands heavily, like sick lungs. You remember a large basket, bundles of food clutched in your hands, and the grateful smiles of the hungry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}马厩是农奴干活的地方，不是领主该待的地方，但不知为何，你的身体却牢牢地铭记着贫穷的味道。你的意识沉重、膨胀，仿佛水肿的肺叶一般。你记得那个大篮子，记得手里捧过的一捆捆食物，还有那些挨饿的人感激的笑容。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los establos son para campesinos, no para soberanos. Pero de alguna manera tu cuerpo recuerda bien el aroma de la pobreza. Tu consciencia se expande arduamente, como pulmones enfermos. Recuerdas una cesta de gran tamaño, fardos de comida apretados entre las manos y la sonrisa agradecida de los hambrientos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A stable is a place for peasants, not sovereigns. But, somehow, your body remembers the scents of poverty. Your consciousness expands heavily, like sick lungs. You remember a large basket, bundles of food clutched in your hands, and the grateful smiles of the hungry.{/n}

Tu consciencia se expande arduamente, como pulmones enfermos. Recuerdas una cesta de gran tamaño, fardos de comida apretados entre las manos y la sonrisa agradecida de los hambrientos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ahır; hükümdarlar için değil, köylüler içindir. Ancak bir şekilde bedenin, fakirliğin kokusunu hatırlıyor. Bilincin hasta ciğerler gibi ağır ağır genişliyor. Büyük bir sepeti, ellerinin sıkıca tuttuğu yemek bohçalarını ve açların minnettar gülümsemesini hatırlıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A stable is a place for peasants, not sovereigns. But, somehow, your body remembers the scents of poverty. Your consciousness expands heavily, like sick lungs. You remember a large basket, bundles of food clutched in your hands, and the grateful smiles of the hungry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ahır; hükümdarlar için değil, köylüler içindir. Ancak bir şekilde bedenin, fakirliğin kokusunu hatırlıyor. Bilincin hasta ciğerler gibi ağır ağır genişliyor. Büyük bir sepeti, ellerinin sıkıca tuttuğu yemek bohçalarını ve açların minnettar gülümsemesini hatırlıyorsun.{/n}

languages.text: {n}馬房は小作人のための場所であって、統治者のための場所ではない。しかし、どういうわけかあなたの身体は貧困の匂いを覚えていた。あなたの意識は、病気の肺のようにのろのろと広がる。大きなかご、手に抱えた食料の束、そして飢えた者たちの感謝の笑みを思い出した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A stable is a place for peasants, not sovereigns. But, somehow, your body remembers the scents of poverty. Your consciousness expands heavily, like sick lungs. You remember a large basket, bundles of food clutched in your hands, and the grateful smiles of the hungry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}馬房は小作人のための場所であって、統治者のための場所ではない。しかし、どういうわけかあなたの身体は貧困の匂いを覚えていた。あなたの意識は、病気の肺のようにのろのろと広がる。大きなかご、手に抱えた食料の束、そして飢えた者たちの感謝の笑みを思い出した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les écuries sont réservées aux manants, pas aux souverains. Pourtant, sans que vous sachiez l'expliquer, votre corps se souvient de l'odeur de la pauvreté. Votre conscience se dilate avec peine, à l'image d'un poumon malade. Vous vous rappelez un grand panier, la nourriture que vous serriez dans vos mains avides, et le sourire reconnaissant des affamés.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A stable is a place for peasants, not sovereigns. But, somehow, your body remembers the scents of poverty. Your consciousness expands heavily, like sick lungs. You remember a large basket, bundles of food clutched in your hands, and the grateful smiles of the hungry.{/n}

Votre conscience se dilate avec peine, à l'image d'un poumon malade. Vous vous rappelez un grand panier, la nourriture que vous serriez dans vos mains avides, et le sourire reconnaissant des affamés.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein Stall ist ein Ort für Bauern, nicht für Herrscher. Doch irgendwie erinnert sich dein Körper an den Geruch der Armut. Dein Bewusstsein weitet sich mühsam wie eine kranke Lunge. Du erinnerst dich an einen großen Korb, Lebensmittel in deinen Händen und das dankbare Lächeln der Hungrigen.{/n}

You remember a large basket, bundles of food clutched in your hands, and the grateful smiles of the hungry.{/n}

Dein Bewusstsein weitet sich mühsam wie eine kranke Lunge. Du erinnerst dich an einen großen Korb, Lebensmittel in deinen Händen und das dankbare Lächeln der Hungrigen.{/n}
